{verso} [Absender:] Dr Schenker Böckstein Kurhaus (Salzbg)
[An:] H. Dr [/] Felix Salzer Wien, XIII Maxinggasse 12
[postmarks:] || BÖCKSTEIN | 19. VI. 34-13 | a || || 1/1 WIEN 79 | 20. VI. 34 11 | 1 a ||
Mein lieber D^r^ Salzer! The proposed date for this undated letter is provided by Schenker's diary entry for that date (OJ 4/7, p. 3,917).

Der erste Brief, den ich hier vorgefunden, war von unserem l.[ieben] H. Weisse, Click on Hans Weisse. Weisse's letter (OC 44/41) had been sent from Tenants Harbor on June 2, 1934. Schenker's diary reports: "Karten an: [...], Dr. Salzer, [...]. - Post restante erlagen: von D^r^ Weisse (Br): möchte bald den freien Satz haben, besitzt ein Auto, weilt am Meeresstrand "mit mehreren befreundeten Familien" (wohl ihm??)." ("Postcards to: [...], Dr. Salzer, [...]. - Dealt with [the mail in] the poste restante: from Dr. Weisse (letter): he would like to have Der freie Satz soon; owns a car, is staying at the seaside "with several families that are friends" (his cup of tea??).") (OJ 4/7, p. 3,917). er hat mich freudig gestimmt u. ich gebe Ihnen gern die Freude weiter: er weilt am Atlantischen Ozean in Tenants-Harbor, Maine; er besitzt ein Auto, das beide Weisse and his wife Hertha (née Hartmann). lenken können! Vielleicht treffen's auch schon die Kleinchen? Weisse's daughters, Susanna (b. 1929) and Monica (b. 1930).
Ihnen u. Ihrer verehrten Gattin beste Grüße von uns Beiden

tei:translation.tei:p: {recto} [picture, caption: Spa Böckstein 1127m, view toward the Anlauf Valley and Ankogel Group 3252m (Salzburg)]

{verso} [From:] Dr Schenker Böckstein Spa House (Salzburg)
[To:] Dr Felix Salzer Vienna, XIII Maxinggasse 12
[postmarks:] || BÖCKSTEIN | 19. VI. 34-13 | a || || 1/1 WIEN 79 | 20. VI. 34 11 | 1 a ||

The first letter I found waiting for me here was from our dear Hans Weisse; it put me in good spirits which I gladly pass on to you: he is staying at the Atlantic Ocean in Tenants Harbor, Maine; he owns a car which both of them can drive! Perhaps even the little ones can also do it?
Best wishes to you and your dear wife from us both,
